Text:
Here's the CD info page although this is a cassette rip
http://www.discogs.com/Miles-Davis-Plays-Classic-Ballads/release/1130672

I may suggest playing it a little low on the volume as the rip is quite loud, but clear.

Enjoy!
Also seems to be a slight crackle on a1 but certain that's the nature of that track as it disappears immediately on a2 and the rest of the songs are crystal.
Yep, I definitely ripped this at too loud a volume. It's got quite a bit of crackle now that I listen to it a few times. Sorry folks, guess I'll go through the receiver next time.

Final comment
The crackle is the nature of the cassette, it's a bit old.
So I won't be re-ripping.
Moving on to Republica vinyl.

Cheers
